ch0090_00_daigo/0101_0701_01_10:
Good to see you, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
You’re looking particularly cheerful today.
ch0090_00_daigo/0101_0701_02_10:
Where are you heading out to? Perhaps I could
tag along, if that’s all right.
ch0090_00_daigo/0601_0701_01_10:
I’ve done a fair bit of wandering from place to
place, starting with the Hoenn region, where I
grew up.
ch0090_00_daigo/0601_0701_02_10:
Part of my goal was to traverse the land in search
of rare stones, but more than that...
ch0090_00_daigo/0601_0701_03_10:
I wanted to walk this world on my own two feet.
To see it with my own eyes. To feel it on my
very skin.
ch0090_00_daigo/0601_0701_04_10:
How about you? What is it that you want to learn
or experience here on Pasio? I’d be interested to
hear your story sometime.
ch0090_00_daigo/0601_0702_01_10:
As a Champion, I wouldn’t have been able to
travel around so freely if not for the support
I had from others.
ch0090_00_daigo/0601_0702_02_10:
I’m eternally grateful for all of the help they
gave me.
ch0090_00_daigo/0602_0701_01_10:
Traveling here and there—hunting rare stones
and collecting my favorites—is my hobby.
ch0090_00_daigo/0602_0701_02_10:
Although...you probably already knew that.
I’m sure I’ve mentioned it at least once or twice.
ch0090_00_daigo/0602_0701_03_10: Anyways, the reason I keep bringing it up is...
ch0090_00_daigo/0602_0701_04_10:
Well, it’s sync stones. Do you think it would be
possible to take a sync stone back to the
Hoenn region with me?
ch0090_00_daigo/0602_0702_01_10:
Did you know that sync stones react to the bond
between a sync pair? The stronger that bond is,
the brighter the stone shines.
ch0090_00_daigo/0602_0702_02_10:
With a luster like that, sync stones probably rank
as one of my top five favorite kinds of stones
in existence.
ch0090_00_daigo/0603_0701_01_10:
Sync pairs are what ideal partnership between
people and Pokémon looks like.
ch0090_00_daigo/0603_0701_02_10:
It would be amazing if this sort of relationship
expanded beyond Pasio someday.
ch0090_00_daigo/0603_0701_03_10:
Think about it. We would all be so much more
in tune with one another. It could bring harmony
to the entire planet.
ch0090_00_daigo/0603_0702_01_10:
I hope that someday the world will accept the
simple, most fundamental truth into their hearts...
ch0090_00_daigo/0603_0702_02_10:
The truth that people and Pokémon are connected.
We simply can’t exist without each other.
ch0090_00_daigo/0604_0701_01_10:
I have a house in Mossdeep City, back in Hoenn.
I was staying there before I traveled to Pasio.
ch0090_00_daigo/0604_0701_02_10:
Have you met Tate and Liza? They’re the
Mossdeep City Gym Leaders, so I’ve had a lot
of interaction with them...
ch0090_00_daigo/0604_0701_03_10:
It really is a splendid place.
You should visit sometime.
ch0090_00_daigo/0604_0701_04_10:
I’d love to show you to my home, though you’ll
have to forgive the rather sparse decor...
ch0090_00_daigo/0604_0702_01_10:
I wonder what my next adventure will be after
I return to Mossdeep City...
ch0090_00_daigo/0604_0702_02_10:
I could always do a bit more traveling.
Or perhaps I could settle down and dedicate
my time to training.
ch0090_00_daigo/0605_0701_01_10:
There are many things in this world that one
cannot accomplish alone.
ch0090_00_daigo/0605_0701_02_10:
That’s why it’s so essential that we have friends...
and that we help each other when we’re in need.
ch0090_00_daigo/0605_0701_03_10:
With you and I and our Pokémon all working
together, [Name:PlayerNickname ]...
ch0090_00_daigo/0605_0701_04_10:
I feel like we could overcome any disaster that
comes at us. Don’t you agree?
ch0090_00_daigo/0605_0702_01_10:
I’ve been keeping an eye on you and your
Pokémon. You’ve been training hard, pushing
yourselves to grow stronger.
ch0090_00_daigo/0605_0702_02_10:
I like to see partners who do their best together.
That’s why I like you so much!
ch0090_00_daigo/1701_0701_01_10: Ah, I was just about to go look for you.
ch0090_00_daigo/1701_0701_02_10: I got you a present. It’s right here.
ch0090_00_daigo/1701_0702_01_10: I hope it will come in handy for you.
ch0090_00_daigo/1701_0702_02_10:
I thought about giving you one of my favorite
stones, but I was afraid it might weigh down
your bag...
ch0090_00_daigo/2501_0701_01_10:
A lot of great sync pairs have gathered here
on Pasio...
ch0090_00_daigo/2501_0701_02_10:
but I find myself particularly drawn to you and
your Pokémon.
ch0090_00_daigo/2501_0701_03_10:
It’s clear that your battle skills are a cut above
the rest, and you share a close-knit bond with
each other.
ch0090_00_daigo/2501_0701_04_10:
But what really impresses me is the number of
friends you have made who truly support you.
ch0090_00_daigo/2501_0701_05_10:
It’s an incredible power to have. Don’t go taking it
for granted, all right?
ch0090_00_daigo/2501_0702_01_10:
If you ever make it to the Hoenn region in the
future, come and find me. I’ll be waiting for
your challenge.
ch0090_00_daigo/2501_0702_02_10:
Let’s put it all on the line. No holding back... Just
me and you in a battle to see who’s the strongest!
ch0090_00_daigo/2511_0701_01_10:
We all have a hidden glimmer within ourselves...
a hidden excellence.
ch0090_00_daigo/2511_0701_02_10:
When we’re passionate about something or we’re
protecting something we care about, that glimmer
inside us shines really brightly...
ch0090_00_daigo/2511_0701_03_10:
like the way the facets of a gemstone glint in
the light. I love people and Pokémon that have
that sort of glimmer.
ch0090_00_daigo/2511_0701_04_10:
I mean people and Pokémon like you and your
partner. I was referring to you two, in case that
didn’t come across.
ch0090_00_daigo/2511_0702_01_10:
It’s not about what’s on the outside.
That beautiful glimmer shines from within you.
ch0090_00_daigo/2511_0702_02_10:
It may not be visible to you, but to those of us
who see you doing your very best each day,
you shine like a precious gem.
ch0090_00_daigo/2511_0702_03_10: That’s why I like you both so much.
ch0090_00_daigo/3001_0701_01_10:
Fine weather we’re having this morning.
It would be perfect for collecting stones.
ch0090_00_daigo/3002_0701_01_10:
You’re always so active and full of life!
Just being around you gives me a boost of energy.
ch0090_00_daigo/3003_0701_01_10:
I think it would be fun to explore different areas
and compare all the stones we find.
ch0090_00_daigo/3004_0701_01_10:
Pasio is a big island. Before you sprint across it
in one go, try taking your time and enjoying
the sights.
ch0090_00_daigo/3005_0701_01_10:
How are you and your Pokémon doing? Be careful
not to push yourselves too hard, all right?
ch0090_00_daigo/3006_0701_01_10:
Some stones shine brightly even in the deepest
darkness...like the stars that shine in the night sky.
